results.content:
Hi Attreya,

I was very happy with the course but while taking the course it was in my told in the first few lectures that students will be taught to make a chatbot however the full flow of chatbot was not explained step by step.
This was really disappointing for someone who has no idea about chatbots and wanted to make a fully functional chatbot.
Please look into it if anything can be done in this regard.
results.content_html:
Hi Attreya,

This was really disappointing for someone who has no idea about chatbots and wanted to make a fully functional chatbot.
Please look into it if anything can be done in this regard.

results.content: A very thought out course with focus on fundamentals. The chatbot creation process was the most fun part. And learning Bootstrap 4 was pretty cool too.
results.content_html: A very thought out course with focus on fundamentals. The chatbot creation process was the most fun part. And learning Bootstrap 4 was pretty cool too.

results.content:
I tried several course to learn Bootstrap 4 and responsive web development but this is far the best one. In the first few sections basics of Web dev like HTML, CSS and jQuery are taught.

But it really steps up the game when teaching Bootstrap 4 and the Capstone Project of teaching chatbot development.
results.content_html:
I tried several course to learn Bootstrap 4 and responsive web development but this is far the best one. In the first few sections basics of Web dev like HTML, CSS and jQuery are taught.

But it really steps up the game when teaching Bootstrap 4 and the Capstone Project of teaching chatbot development.

results.content:
This course not only gives a very deep understanding of Bootstrap 4 but also shows how it can be easily implemented while making a responsive website.

I also liked the bonus, chatbot building videos and was able to create them with ease.
results.content_html:
This course not only gives a very deep understanding of Bootstrap 4 but also shows how it can be easily implemented while making a responsive website.

I also liked the bonus, chatbot building videos and was able to create them with ease.

results.content: This is one of the finest course I have ever learned online. The instructor has explained each aspect in details. All examples are highly relevant. Please add more information on hosting if possible. There are not many articles available online which gives a perfect explanation for that. Thank you.
results.content_html: This is one of the finest course I have ever learned online. The instructor has explained each aspect in details. All examples are highly relevant. Please add more information on hosting if possible. There are not many articles available online which gives a perfect explanation for that. Thank you.

results.content: I've used Bootstrap before, but I now have a much better understanding of the grid system and how to use it to build custom layouts.
results.content_html: I've used Bootstrap before, but I now have a much better understanding of the grid system and how to use it to build custom layouts.

results.content: This is a really high quality course that starts with basics like HTML5 and CSS3. Then it  goes on to better things like Bootstrap 4. This is the from zero approach that I wanted with the course. I binge watched all the videos and was able to completely build the chatbot + portfolio website in under 3 hours. Highly recommended course!
results.content_html: This is a really high quality course that starts with basics like HTML5 and CSS3. Then it goes on to better things like Bootstrap 4. This is the from zero approach that I wanted with the course. I binge watched all the videos and was able to completely build the chatbot + portfolio website in under 3 hours. Highly recommended course!

results.content: Well, i already know first video stuff like javascript, bootstrap and so on, but this chatbot platform is awesome and easy to learn for now, so i'm giving you 5 starts for pointing out in that platform direction :)
results.content_html: Well, i already know first video stuff like javascript, bootstrap and so on, but this chatbot platform is awesome and easy to learn for now, so i'm giving you 5 starts for pointing out in that platform direction :)

results.content: Very nice demonstration ; easy to understand
The problem I have with this course is after you build the website, the Chatbot hosting platform cost $149.00 per month, and $499.00 for businesses, after 14 day trial. Chat that!
results.content_html: The problem I have with this course is after you build the website, the Chatbot hosting platform cost $149.00 per month, and $499.00 for businesses, after 14 day trial. Chat that!

results.content: brief and straight to the point

The first section is about installing python, which I hope the lecturer will implement python in his html for creating chatbot. But  when go to the last section (project example ) and his provided-code don't have anything about python. Also, the project just use the chatbot provider website, don't create his own. Not worth to pay.

results.content: Great Instructor. Great course. The chat-bot creation was really simple and I enjoyed the whole process. Highly recommended course!

results.content: Only thing I've learned is to incorporate a chatbot into a website and also how to migrate from Bootstrap 3 to 4.
